title: Reasons for China, India migration movements

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains all of the migration movements shown on the map above?

choices.label: Large labor surpluses in India and China, due to the success of British and Qing agricultural reforms
The end of the slave trade in the Americas and the intensification of European colonial expansion in Africa
Labor shortages in plantation agriculture, the mineral extraction industry, and transportation projects
The end of revolutions in the Americas and the establishment of the American republics

topic.text: 6.6: Causes of Migration in an Interconnected World

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
